SELECT iit.*, fo.org_name, mi.item_description,
CASE WHEN iit.transaction_type_id = 'store_po' OR iit.transaction_type_id = 'store_other' OR iit.transaction_type_id = 'transfer_in' THEN iit.transaction_price ELSE 0 END in_price,
CASE WHEN iit.transaction_type_id = 'deliver' or iit.transaction_type_id = 'transfer_out' THEN iit.transaction_price ELSE 0 END out_price,
CASE WHEN iit.transaction_type_id = 'store_po' OR iit.transaction_type_id = 'store_other' OR iit.transaction_type_id = 'transfer_in' THEN iit.transaction_quantity ELSE 0 END in_quantity,
CASE WHEN iit.transaction_type_id = 'deliver' or iit.transaction_type_id = 'transfer_out' THEN iit.transaction_quantity ELSE 0 END out_quantity,
CASE WHEN iit.transaction_type_id = 'store_po' OR iit.transaction_type_id = 'store_other' OR iit.transaction_type_id = 'transfer_in' THEN iit.transaction_amount ELSE 0 END in_amount,
CASE WHEN iit.transaction_type_id = 'deliver' or iit.transaction_type_id = 'transfer_out' THEN iit.transaction_amount ELSE 0 END out_amount,
CASE WHEN iit.transaction_type_id = 'store_po' OR iit.transaction_type_id = 'store_other' OR iit.transaction_type_id = 'transfer_in' THEN (iit.begin_amount + iit.transaction_amount)/(iit.begin_quantity + iit.transaction_quantity) ELSE (iit.begin_amount - iit.transaction_amount)/(iit.begin_quantity - iit.transaction_quantity) END end_price,
CASE WHEN iit.transaction_type_id = 'store_po' OR iit.transaction_type_id = 'store_other' OR iit.transaction_type_id = 'transfer_in' THEN iit.begin_quantity + iit.transaction_quantity ELSE iit.begin_quantity - iit.transaction_quantity END end_quantity,
CASE WHEN iit.transaction_type_id = 'store_po' OR iit.transaction_type_id = 'store_other' OR iit.transaction_type_id = 'transfer_in' THEN iit.begin_amount + iit.transaction_amount ELSE iit.begin_amount - iit.transaction_amount END end_amount
FROM inv_item_transaction iit LEFT JOIN fnd_org fo ON iit.inv_org_id = fo.org_id LEFT JOIN mdm_item mi ON iit.item_id = mi.item_id
where 1=1 and mi.item_description like '%${item_description}%' and fo.org_name like '%${org_name}%' ORDER BY iit.create_date desc limit #{startIndex},#{perPage}
